features: Contains three 16 ounce bottles of hello activated charcoal extra freshening mouthwash
Hello activated charcoal extra freshening mouthwash gives you an extra clean mouth with activated charcoal from sustainable bamboo, a natural ingredient that detoxifies bad breath odors

This fluoride free black rinse (yup, it’s black) is thoughtfully formulated to make swishing fun and friendly. Bag the alcohol and add coconut oil, tea tree oil, and xylitol, and boom, you have a rinse that’s a little swish of heaven. Swish happy
Our rinse contains no alcohol, no dyes, no artificial sweeteners or flavors, no SLS sulfates. No brainer
Choose friendly. hello is vegan, never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified) and made in the USA. Rinse and greet freely
body.description: Say hello to naturally friendly activated charcoal extra freshening mouthwash. Thoughtfully formulated with activated charcoal (made from sustainable bamboo), coconut oil to moisturize, tea tree oil to cleanse, fresh mint to freshen breath, and xylitol because it rocks. But buckle-up, there's more goodness: hello contains no alcohol, no artificial sweeteners, no artificial flavors, no dyes and no SLS sulfates. As if that weren't enough magic for one bottle, hello is also vegan and never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified and PETA recognized). Finally, a naturally friendly and healthy way to show your mouth some love.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: take a swish on the wild side. this fluoride free black rinse rocks activated charcoal from sustainable bamboo, a natural detoxifier that keeps breath next-level fresh. it also contains coconut oil, tea tree oil, and xylitol. so delish, they'll rush to rinse. finally, a kid’s fluoride free mouthwash they’ll seriously love to use. it tastes awesome, freshens breath, and rinses away stuff brushing might miss. no joke, it’s everyone’s swish come true. more rinsing, less wincing. make buds with your tastebuds and kick plaque, gingivitis, and bad breath to the curb. this super friendly formula features aloe vera to protect gums, coconut oil to moisturize, mint to freshen and natural sweeteners that rock.

we think it’s time personal care was, well, personal. relevant. beautiful. delicious. friendly. and as natural as we can make it. we’re on a mission to make the world a friendlier place, starting with your mouth. hello is naturally friendly oral care, created by an entrepreneurial bunch using thoughtful ingredients so delicious you’ll rush to brush. for reals. swish happy. say hello to a naturally friendly and healthy way to show your mouth some love. our delicious, effective, alcohol free mouthwashes help protect against gingivitis and rinse away the germs and nasty bits that brushing and good intentions may have missed. with high quality, thoughtful ingredients like aloe vera, coconut oil, and xylitol, these rinses are your swish come true. more rinsing, less wincing. make a swish and choose friendly. no alcohol, no artificial sweeteners, no artificial flavors, no dyes, and no SLS/sulfates. no brainer. hello is vegan, cruelty free, and never tested on animals. hello's mouthwash bottles are made from 25% per (post-consumer recycled), because hello cares about packaging too. best of all, our kids rinses are formulated without mint so kids can say goodbye to "spicy", and hello to natural flavors that'll make them smile wide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouth Feels Fresh
reviews.reviewText: Twice, I use another twice, with fluoride to protect my teeth, but I use this when I brush first thing in the. morning before eating and it is perfect for me at that time. Mouth feels fresh and gums and teeth also feel good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This helps your Teeth!
reviews.reviewText: I use this product 3 times a day and it helps Rebuild your enamel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: It works well and not too strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great, natural mouthwash made with coconut oil which, by itself, is great for oil pulling and eliminates a lot of harmful bacteria from your mouth. I love what the brand stands for and I'll order again when I run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Here’s a mouth wash that is refreshing and works. It is a bit odd, in that the charcoal makes it a black color…which doesn’t stain your teeth, but it does make a bit of a mess in your sink unless you’re careful. (Hence the 4 stars).But it works and doesn’t have alcohol, so we keep using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars El enjuague bucal que no debe faltar!
reviews.reviewText: Excelente enjuague, además muy económico, lo recomiendo ampliamente!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've tried many, but HELLO is by far the BEST
reviews.reviewText: I've tried many brands over the years, but HELLO is by far the BEST. I've been using their toothpaste and mouthwash for more than a year now, and I'm certain they're the best. After I floss and brush, I swish the mouthwash for several minutes, because the aloe vera has healing properties, and the coconut oil is what Ayurvedic medicine uses for "oil pulling" (look it up -- it's a proven detox method for removing toxicity from the blood, tongue and teeth).This mouthwash leaves my mouth feeling clean and fresh for hours, and does not have a sting or an overpowering flavor. Try it, I did, and now it's the only one I want to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When i use this when i clean my mouth it enhances my mouth and it doesn’t sting or burn my throat neither my tongue like other generic brands
Me encantó el sabor y la sensación de limpieza que deja.
Deja una sensación a limpio, lo que espero que si sea.El sabor es agradable, no es fuerte y no sabe mal

Love the taste and feel of this mouthwash, and the fact is very natural. However, it doesn't have that cutting edge some good mouthwashes and its effects does not last any longer than a few hours, so I am disappointed compared to rinses that lasts at least 12 hours.
